section.header: Question: I am a Maid so what now ?
section.body: A Maid? Well from what I understand a Maid of [Aspect] is one who creates/organises their Aspect.They will serve their Aspect but in doing so eventually...sort of have have their Aspect's Will in their Doing ? It is Complicated.Either way they(and you) also Embrace their Aspect,all the parts of it,like all the good and bad stuff.

faq.header: How can I best show my friends and enemies what I'm MAID of?
faq.body: Nice pun. But seriously, remember you can create your aspect, and that aspects are more then their literal interpretations e.g. Breath and Freedom.

section.header: Why are my quests so boring?
section.body: I bet you're a Maid. Maids get to do various things that serve their aspect, up until they are high enough level to SERVE their aspect to their enemies on a silver plate of whoop ass.

section.header: What's up with these leg wrappings? How are they "Maid"?
section.body: Hey, if you have ever seen the weirder costumes, you would not be complaining. The wrappings look cool!

section.header: If I'm the Maid of X, why is everybody else so much more full of X than normal?
section.body: As a Maid, you serve your aspect to your friends. You get some along with, but it's mostly something you give to others.
